data_details.label: Working memory

data_details.docstring: Rules fired since the beginning of the process in sequence

data_details.label: Remark
data_details.docstring: Can be used for any additional explanation

data: rule 10 is fired therefore R is added to the working memory
rule 4 is fired therefore H is added
rule 7 is fired therefore W is added
Rule 3 is fired therefore C is added to the working memory
No more rules are able to be fired. Process will be terminated and C is the final decision
